aab7379a-b917-44d8-a073-df46bd99b847.description: The ETA CPP program sets the standard for professional performance in the payments industry and is a symbol of excellence. It signifies that an individual has demonstrated the knowledge and skills required to perform competently in today’s complex electronic payments environment.
aab7379a-b917-44d8-a073-df46bd99b847.name: ETA CPP

alignments.name: Qualifications Required
alignments.description: ETA’s CPP certification is for all payments professionals from novice to seasoned professionals, agents, ISOs, and Payment Facilitators. Qualifications to become an ETA CPP include: (a) 1 year of industry-related experience and a high school diploma, associate, or bachelor’s degree; or (b) 3 years of industry-related work experience.

badge_template_activities.title: ETA’s CPP encompasses all facets of the payments ecosystem, from sales and marketing, governmental regulations, security and compliance requirements to the latest in technology and trends ensuring a full mastery of the payments industry.
